description.narrative: The overall goal of the Niger Irrigation Program is promote private sector investments in irrigation in Niger. The Program will promote access to affordable, efficient irrigation equipment to small and medium sized farmers in Niger. By helping farmers adopt and sustain improved irrigation technologies, the program aims to increase their agricultural productivity and strengthen farmer’s resilience to climate change.
